item.title: 5 Ways I Use Background Coding Agents Every Day
item.description: Coding agents are different from in-editor chat and agent modes for AI assisted programming. They run asynchronously—often in the cloud—tackling tasks while you focus locally. I rely heavily on the GitHub Copilot coding agent and its VS Code integration to spin up multiple parallel workflows. Below Link to article: https://montemagno.com/5-ways-i-use-background-coding-agents-every-day/
